text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Forecasters predict business will never go "back to normal."
9,500 stores went out of business in 2019, but more than 15,000 could shut down permanently in 2020 because chains will have trouble recovering from the coronavirus closures, says an estimate from Coresight Research. https://t.co/bBl6hHrNGw
